# What is the index.html file?

The index.html file is the backbone of your webpage, it is the home screen and the center where all things seem to render from. It's also not that complicated, it's quite similar to any other .html file you will find on your soon to be webpage, but the name acts like a default setting and points to where your browser should look in the folder when rendering your page.
